name: Sympathy's Design System
description:
What is Sympathy's Design System?

Sympathy's Design System is a component library that I personally use for my daily work as a product manager.

And because I feel it is more efficient and convenient than Axure, I have released it to the Figma Community as open source content.


What can Sympathy's Design System do?

Figma's Auto-layout and Variants provide very powerful features that make it very easy to build pages, but only if you have a library of components and page templates.

This design system is designed to do just that, It is designed for business management systems and supports the quick building of general pages such as Forms, Tables, Details, Dashboard, and Data analysis

etc.

It encapsulates all unnecessary attributes in components such as Colors, Fonts, Status, Interactions, Layouts, so that the product manager who is not familiar with Figma only needs to consider the fields of the page when prototyping.


What is the plan of Sympathy's Design System?

The design system is still working in progress, and it will update as soon as possible.
